node.title: Man arrested after serious assault at Upper Hutt petrol station
node.description: A man remains in hospital with life-threatening injuries from the serious assault last Saturday.
node.content:
["A 39-year-old man has been charged in relation to a serious assault in Upper Hutt last Saturday.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "The man has been charged with wounding and assault with a weapon.", "He is due to appear in the Hutt Valley District Court tomorrow.", "Following the assault, the man remains in Wellington Hospital with life-threatening injuries.", "People are wanting to speak to anyone who was at the Caltex Rimutaka Fergusson Drive area between 7:40pm and 8:40pm last Saturday, or anyone who may have dash cam or home CCTV footage.", "Anyone with information is asked to call police on 105 and quoting file number 220320/3075 or anonymously via Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
